excerpt: Spend the evening socializing with other UXers and celebrating the wonders of the holiday season.
markdown:
Come join the celebration!

*UXPA Seattle and Puget Sound SIGCHI are hosting our 3rd Annual UX Community Holiday Party!*

**[Get tickets through Eventbrite](https://goo.gl/IWujN8)**

Spend the evening socializing with other UXers and celebrating the wonders of the holiday season. The evening’s festivities will include:

* champagne upon entry (21 years and older)
* appetizers
* wine and beer
* door prizes
* holiday activities and a photo booth for a fun evening
* community awards

There will also be networking opportunities with local business leaders and recruiters.

**We’ll also be hosting a toy drive benefitting [Northwest Center](https://www.nwcenter.org/) at the party! Bring a new, unwrapped toy or a cash/check donation and place it in the specially marked bin!**

Disclaimer: Be sure to bring your ID. Guests 21 years and older will be given a bracelet upon check-in and ID review.

Help make the UX Holiday Party great and promote your organization by becoming a sponsor! For more info on sponsorship opportunities, please email info@uxpa.org.
title: 3rd Annual UX Community Holiday Party and Toy Drive
